title: Victoria Beckham in Victoria, Victoria Beckham Dojo Pants - Vogue
text: Victoria Beckham Is Back for London Fashion Week With a Whole New Look February 21, 2017 5:20 PM by Edward Barsamian Photo: Courtesy of Chioma Nnadi / @nnadibynature What can’t Victoria Beckham wear? While in New York recently to present her latest collection, Beckham sashayed through the streets in everything from track pants to chiffon skirting , while less than a week later the It Brit took to the ski slopes in Whistler en famille in snow-white shades . And earlier today at The Ritz London, Beckham debuted her new Victoria, Victoria Beckham collection and introduced her latest boyish-inspired trouser silhouette, the loose dojo pant. The look could be considered an evolution from September, when Beckham sported exposed-button trousers and slouchy-fit denim . We’ve seen hints of Beckham’s latest silhouette earlier this year, as in Paris when she wore a self-tie belt style with Adidas shell toes , but today’s look was a new direction for the designer. Keeping her palette one-note, Beckham opted for shades of black, which were cleverly offset by the persimmon belt and white pumps. Call it a posh alternative to comfy dressing . In This Story: Victoria Beckham Recommended For You
